content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am interested in the apartment. I would like to offer 300 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than the market value for such a centrally located, brand-new apartment. I'm looking for a more fair price that reflects the quality of the space. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. I will make another offer. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While this is closer to the market value, I still believe the apartment deserves a higher price given its prime location and modern amenities. Would you be willing to negotiate further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I am always open to negotiations. I will make another offer. I am willing to pay 450 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's a fair offer, considering the apartment's condition and location. However, I'm confident that with the high demand for such rentals, we can still find a price that satisfies both parties. Would you be willing to go a bit higher?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. I will make another offer. I am willing to pay 480 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Your willingness to negotiate is appreciated. This new offer is quite close to what I had in mind. Would you be willing to come up just a bit more to make it a round number?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sure, I will make another offer. I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent! I believe we have a deal at 500 euros per month. The apartment is yours! Thank you for your time and for choosing my property. I look forward to a long and fruitful relationship. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
